main event: A military personnel observed an unidentified flying object at Shaw AFB, South Carolina on April 24, 1954.
interesting points: The object was described as green and round with green exhaust., The size of the object was approximately the diameter of a pop bottle., The object was observed for about five seconds., It was estimated to be flying at 7033 feet at a speed of 5011 knots., The sighting was made through binoculars by personnel at the Columbia Radio Range Station.
sighted object: one green round object emitting green exhaust
witness description: personnel at Columbia Radio Range Station
